markdownRemark.html: Located just 8km from Granada, this is a fantastic golf course located in a unique environment, with views of the Sierra Nevada and the city of Granada. This course is not the most challenging, but sometimes it is complicated, especially with the number of bunkers. This is one of two golf courses near the city of Granada and is lovely and well maintained.

frontmatter.title: Granada Club de Golf
frontmatter.description: Granada Club de Golf - Located just 8km from Granada, this is a fantastic golf course located in a unique environment, with views of the Sierra Nevada and the city of Granada. This course is not the most challenging, but sometimes it is complicated, especially with the number of bunkers. This is one of two golf courses near the city of Granada and is lovely and well maintained.
frontmatter.address: Avda. de los Cosarios s/n, Las Gabias,  18110 Granada, Spain
frontmatter.price: Highest green fee weekdays 37.00 euros, Highest green fee weekends 52.00 euros
